title: Ticket #2145: Document #549 ROTATE_HISTORY_DAILY ROTATE_HISTORY_MONTHLY
description:
Somewhere in 7.3, probably late 7.3, the settings ROTATE_HISTORY_DAILY and ROTATE_HISTORY_MONTHLY were added to fix #549 in commit [14988]. They were never documented.

Proposed documentation, to be added to the schedd section:

  ROTATE_HISTORY_DAILY - Defaults to false. If true, the history file will be rotated once per day. This is in addition to rotations that occur due to MAX_HISTORY_LOG.
  ROTATE_HISTORY_MONTHLY - Defaults to false. If true, the history file will be rotated once per month. This is in addition to rotations that occur due to MAX_HISTORY_LOG.
